synopsis: In episode #9, the hosts Devam and Ahir welcome guest Vivek Menon, who shares his inspiring journey in filmmaking, highlighting the challenges and triumphs of creating his show 'New Normal' with his father. The conversation delves into the importance of self-expression, the creative process, and the value of embracing one's identity as an artist.
quotes: The best way of learning is by doing it and putting yourself out there.
You should not be afraid to call yourself what you want to be.
If you can prove to people that you're creating something valuable, they'll come around.
Your experience and your voice is the most unique thing you can write.
The idea of success is not just about being famous; it's about continuously doing what you love.
If you spend so much time and effort making something, you can't even watch it with people who are supporting you.
Make that podcast, make that song, regardless of whether or not that ends up being your passion.
Thereâ€™s a reason you feel driven to do that thing and not a million other things.
The script is never done until the minute you shoot it.
It's fine to have a million things going on, as long as you're doing what you love.
